column4: really depends what you want to talk about, join #<subject> to see if there is such a place
yeah, there are a few nice rooms, but I was just looking for something that is general, not ##off-topic, and has some people.
#landfill and #photogeeks is kinda nice, but there are often times not enough people.
well, now I'm just getting my fresh reinstall up to snuff.

that is the thing with the big chans, lots of folk but the y have to be strictly modded or traffic becomes too high and support dissappears in the noise, anyway that is enough about off-topic subjects in here for now :)
